definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
used in place names, notably Kunlun Mountains 崑崙|昆仑[Kun1 lun2]/(also used for transliteration)
descendant/elder brother/a style of Chinese poetry
to deal a single fatal blow/(fig.) to totally repudiate sb because of a minor error
to bludgeon/to hit with a big stick

sentences.english: A woman is poking at the debris with a stick, trying to move aside large pieces of plywood.
sentences.chinese: 一位女士在碎砾中用棍将一块块合板木挑开。

sentences.english: All he had eyes for was the truncheon in the guard's hand.
sentences.chinese: 他看到的只有那个警卫手中的橡皮棍。

sentences.english: Woe to the Assyrian, the rod of my anger, in whose hand is the club of my wrath!
sentences.chinese: 亚述是我怒气的棍，手中拿我恼恨的杖。

sentences.english: The twitch of his tail can break a man's leg like a matchstick .
sentences.chinese: 牠抽动尾巴可以像折断火柴棍似的打断一个人的腿。

sentences.english: Use muddler to lightly press mint and dissolve sugar.
sentences.chinese: 用捣棍轻轻压碎薄荷，撒上糖。

sentences.english: Peas were brushed and gourds poled.
sentences.chinese: 豌豆打了尖，葫芦支上了棍。

sentences.english: Now we're heading for your hotel, the Grand Guest House.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们前往您下棍的酒店大华宾馆。

sentences.english: Don't whittle the stick into a short one.
Then the local people "Vol wrap" called "ding men stick.
sentences.chinese: 当地人又把“裹卷”叫“顶门棍”。

sentences.english: O Assyrian, the rod of mine anger, and the staff in their hand is mine indignation.
sentences.chinese: 亚述是我怒气的棍，手中拿我恼恨的仗。

sentences.english: The driver was dragged out of his car and coshed.
sentences.chinese: 司机被拖出运货车，头部遭到橡皮棍的猛击。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a novel multiple section stick for exercising Wushu and building body.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种习武及健身中使用的新型多节棍。

sentences.english: To make a chip shot in golf.
sentences.chinese: 有一个窄的金属头的高尔夫球棍。

sentences.english: The surface of the printing roller is grinded and chrome plate, counter poise emendation, Steady operation.
sentences.chinese: 印刷棍表面研磨，度硬铬，平衡校正，运转平稳。

sentences.english: They poke at it with long sticks, looking for bodies.
sentences.chinese: 他们用长棍翻开碎砾，寻找尸体。

sentences.english: The fines could be coins or just matchsticks.
sentences.chinese: 罚金可以用钱银也能够用火柴棍代替。

definition: whip or lash/to flog/to whip/conductor's baton/segmented iron weapon (old)/penis (of animal, served as food)
a staff/a rod/cane/walking stick/to flog with a stick (old)
to swing (one's arms, a heavy object)/to wave (a sword, one's fists)/to fling (money)
halberd/long-handled weapon with pointed tip and crescent blade/combined spear and battle-ax
pitchfork/garden fork/restraining pole (used by police)/military fork (of ancient times)
